doctor.name: Dr. Mohammad Ali
doctor.specialty: Mental Diseases, Drug Addiction, Sexual Diseases, Headache & Epilepsy Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Mohammad Ali is a Psychiatrist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Psychiatry), MPhil (Psychiatry), MD (Psychiatry). He is a Assistant Professor of Psychiatry at Pabna Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Shimla Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Mohammad Ali at Shimla Hospital, Pabna is 3pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Shimla Tower, Thana Mor, Hospital Road, Pabna
